      • findSecrets

        @Timed
 @ExceptionMetered
 @GET
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response findSecrets(@Auth
                                                                             User user,
                                                                             @DefaultValue(value="") @QueryParam(value="name")
                                                                             String name,
                                                                             @DefaultValue(value="") @QueryParam(value="nameOnly")
                                                                             String nameOnly,
                                                                             @QueryParam(value="idx")
                                                                             Integer idx,
                                                                             @QueryParam(value="num")
                                                                             Integer num,
                                                                             @DefaultValue(value="true") @QueryParam(value="newestFirst")
                                                                             Boolean newestFirst)
        Retrieve Secret by a specified name and version, or all Secrets if name is not given
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the Secret to retrieve, if provided
        nameOnly - if set, the result only contains the id and name for the secrets.
        idx - if set, the desired starting index in a list of secrets to be retrieved
        num - if set, the number of secrets to retrieve
        newestFirst - whether to order the secrets by creation date with newest first; defaults to true

      • secretVersions

        @Timed
 @ExceptionMetered
 @GET
 @Path(value="versions/{name}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public List<SanitizedSecret> secretVersions(@Auth
                                                                                                                                                 User user,
                                                                                                                                                 @PathParam(value="name")
                                                                                                                                                 String name,
                                                                                                                                                 @QueryParam(value="versionIdx")
                                                                                                                                                 int versionIdx,
                                                                                                                                                 @QueryParam(value="numVersions")
                                                                                                                                                 int numVersions)
        Retrieve the given range of versions of this secret, sorted from newest to oldest update time. If versionIdx is nonzero, then numVersions versions, starting from versionIdx in the list and increasing in index, will be returned (set numVersions to a very large number to retrieve all versions). For instance, versionIdx = 5 and numVersions = 10 will retrieve entries at indices 5 through 14.
        Parameters:
        name - Secret series name
        versionIdx - The index in the list of versions of the first version to retrieve
        numVersions - The number of versions to retrieve

      • resetSecretVersion

        @Path(value="rollback/{secretName}/{versionId}")
 @Timed
 @ExceptionMetered
 @POST
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response resetSecretVersion(@Auth
                                                                                                                                       User user,
                                                                                                                                       @PathParam(value="secretName")
                                                                                                                                       String secretName,
                                                                                                                                       @PathParam(value="versionId")
                                                                                                                                       io.dropwizard.jersey.params.LongParam versionId)
        Rollback to a previous secret version
        Parameters:
        secretName - the name of the secret to rollback
        versionId - the ID of the version to return to
